about_the_game:
Project Search is an atmospheric visual novel inspired by Chinese science fiction and Daoist cultivation of immortality. Set in the spectral landscapes of Linhai, Chongqing, and Dunhuang, the game invites players to explore parallel dimensions, ancient grotto-heavens, and transcendental urban spaces.

Character and Plot

The protagonist, Qian Jiangmin, is a young scholar recovering from illness searching for his brother. His journey gradually reveals hidden grotto-heavens and mysteries about his double vision, propelling him toward self-discovery and transcendence.

You will take on the role of Qian Jiangmin with his HMD (head-mounted display) and drone, a young researcher on a quest to find his brother. Guided by scholars and Daoist cultivators, you will explore the mysterious underground realms hidden within Linhai's old town.

How to Play

Navigate using WASD and arrow keys, with Shift to speed up and Enter to access a bird's-eye view of the level. Use the Spacebar to switch levels, and press and hold i to inspect specific NPCs and locations. Press R to restart the level.

Throughout your journey, approach and interact with dodecahedron objects and hidden features, activated by mouse hovering or clicking, to dive deeper into the lore.

Non-linear Exploration

Designed to be non-linear with no compulsory objectives, Project Search emphasises exploration and discovery. You can switch to 14 levels anytime.

Players are encouraged to wander, uncover hidden artefacts, and piece together the city's incompleteness, imperfection, and picturesqueness. There are no fixed goals—just the thrill of curiosity and adventure.

Sandstorm Dunhuang

Project Search transports players to Dunhuang's ordinary yet metaphysical streets, a significant religious city with ancient cultural heritage in China's far northwest. You will experience the rhythms of everyday life while uncovering deeper spiritual and historical layers.

Foggy Chongqing

Another scene in the game is set in Chongqing, capturing the constant rain, mist, and post-industrial feel of the district adjacent to the Sichuan Fine Arts Institute. This environment adds a hauntingly surreal atmosphere, blending art with the urban landscape.

Non-collision Linhai

Most Project Search unfolds in the old town of Linhai, Taizhou, in Zhejiang province. This setting forms an urban techno-fantasy that links Chinese Daoist philosophies with modern technology, offering a spectral and uncanny vision for players to reflect Chinese cultural heritage.

An Auto-ethnography

Each level in Project Search combines art, myth, and contemplation, creating an immersive experience. This encourages players to distinctly personalise their reflections on spirituality, cultural heritage, and modernity.

Shared Universe with HyperBody

Project Search is set in the same universe as the HyperBody VR game and shares NPCs and specific environments. Fans of HyperBody will enjoy exploring connections at the Garden Portal level, which provides an extended immersive experience across both games.

legal_notice:
Project Search is an academic project that forms part of Chinese cultivation games and the "Cosmotechnics" research. Its purpose is entirely educational and does not involve any commercial interest. It is available for free download.

Project Search uses the edukai (TW-MOE-Std-Kai) font, published by the Ministry of Education of Taiwan (ROC). This font is released under the CC-BY-ND 3.0 license. We extend our sincere appreciation to the Ministry of Education for contributing to Chinese typography and making this font freely available for public use.

Project Search thanks Fengyuan Tian, Ziyi Xu, Yurui Dong, Jianguo Hao, and Zaiwang Bookstore for their encouragement, support, and constructive suggestions during the With in/out Linhai Art Residency and Exhibition in Linhai, Zhejiang, China.

Finally, Project Search would like to thank Yu Hao, Fengyuan Tian, Ziyi Xu, and the anonymous participants from the Digital Games Research Association (DiGRA) and Deutsches Literaturarchiv Marbach who kindly volunteered their time and expertise to evaluate Project Search.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (12th Gen or newer) / AMD Ryzen 7 (5000 or newer)
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

reviews:
“Integrating design techniques such as non-collision, mistiness, and imperfection based on ethnographic studies in Project Search creates an emotionally rich and culturally immersive experience for players.”
DiGRA 2023 Conference
short_description: Project Search is a visual novel of Chinese immortality cultivation. Scholar Qian Jiangmin investigates collapsed pagodas in Linhai's old town while searching for his missing brother. With the help of Daoist cultivators, he explores grotto-heavens and uncovers the truth behind his double vision.

English*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
